issue.title: [Doc] Add feature / implementation matrix
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6602](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6602). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have many different implementations and each implementation makes a different set of features available. It would be nice to have a top-level doc page making it clear which implementation supports what.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6602?focusedCommentId=17133341) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7350
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7350>
